Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted details, a tab with a press-stud at the top and a zip down the front. Sturdy, rib-knit section under the arms and down the sides, a zip at the cuffs and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Nightslip in soft jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined, triangular lace cups and a lace trim at the hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 9 cm.

Popover jacket in printed woven fabric with a detachable, mesh-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip at the top. Kangaroo pocket, a zip in one side, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in fleece.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams, elastication at the waist and hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

All-in-one shell suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable hood. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Lined. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar and welt side pockets. Detachable belt with D-rings and a tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
